text: The long jump event at the 1922 Women's World Games took place in Paris at the Stade Pershing on 20 August 1922. The qualification took place during the morning session with the final taking place during the afternoon session. British Mary Lines won the event with a distance of 5.06 metre, ahead of the American women Elizabeth Stine and Camille Sabie. ==Results== ===Qualification=== The qualification took place during the morning session. The best four athletes qualified for the final. Rank Name Nationality Distance Notes ? Elizabeth Stine Q ? Mary Lines Q ? Camille Sabie Q ? Hilda Hatt Q 5 Marie Mejzlikova II 4.665 m 6 4.48 m 7 Paule Gresset 4.42 m ===Final=== Rank Name Nationality Distance Notes Mary Lines 5.06 m Elizabeth Stine 5.025 m Camille Sabie 4.96 m 4 Hilda Hatt 4.68 m Source: ==References== Category:1922 Women's World Games
